title: Gandhi, Che Guevara, and political uses of art

content.question: Use the following two images to answer all parts of the question that follows. Identify ONE common historical process in the twentieth century that is reflected in both images. Explain ONE difference in the tactics individuals such as Gandhi and Che Guevara (or the groups they represent) adopted to achieve their political goals. Explain ONE way in which images such as these can be seen as an example of the political uses of art in the twentieth century.

frqParts.text: Use the following two images to answer all parts of the question that follows. Identify ONE common historical process in the twentieth century that is reflected in both images. Explain ONE difference in the tactics individuals such as Gandhi and Che Guevara (or the groups they represent) adopted to achieve their political goals. Explain ONE way in which images such as these can be seen as an example of the political uses of art in the twentieth century.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
